_comments.Hello there!: Here is my solution to messy discord embeds.
_comments.#1: These are the controls and are meant to be used in conjunction with EmbedHandler.
_comments.#2: You can name an embed here and add it to the Discord bot
_comments.#3: Use EmbedHandler to retrieve these. Example usage:

parameters-explained.title: Discord embed title
parameters-explained.channel: Channel for embed to be sent in

_comments.#6: This just puts all embeds in one place so its not as messy anymore.
_comments.#7: P.S. - you can use scripts/string_converter.py to format nice strings to json format.

added-student-failure-reply.title: Unknown User ID
added-student-failure-reply.description: Sorry {mention}, I could not find any student enrolled under this ID. Please enter the school ID found in your NAU email.

bot-not-ready.title: Bot Setting Up
bot-not-ready.description: Sorry, {mention}. This bot is still in the process of setting up. Try again in a few minutes

clear-failure.title: Clear Failure
clear-failure.description: Unable to delete messages in {channel_name}: {channel_name} does not exist.

invalid-command.title: Invalid Command
invalid-command.description: Unknown command. Find a list of commands with {prefix}help.

invalid-integration-id.title: School ID Not Found
invalid-integration-id.description: Sorry {mention}, we could not find a student enrolled under the id {integration_id}. Please try again.

key-failure.title: Canvas Key Failure
key-failure.description: Attempt by {mention}: Unable to sey new Canvas key.

lookup-student-failure.title: Student Not Found
lookup-student-failure.description: Sorry, no student was found in the database with this ID.

too-few-args-clear.title: Too Few Arguments
too-few-args-clear.description: This command is invalid. Please provide the channel to clear as a second parameter. Usage: luna.clear <#channel>

unauthorized-user.title: Unauthorized User
unauthorized-user.description: Sorry {mention}, you are not authorized to use this command.

update-database-success.title: Updated Database
update-database-success.description:
Database has been successfully updated.

**Summary**
- {student_insertions} students inserted
 - {course_insertions} courses inserted
